ComicInfo.Title: Blood + Sand
ComicInfo.Summary: Blood + Sand: Batman gathers his family and briefs them on the vampire uprising while testing each of them to determine if they have been compromised. Green Arrow confronts a group of villains knowing that one of them has been turned into a vampire. Jayna grows concerned over her missing brother. Hal continues to pursue his secret master's agenda, which includes betraying a close friend.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 02:03:32. [CVDB895154] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:31. [Issue ID 2278665]
